page.title: 14HIGH TOP OBSERVATORY.
page.content: In January 1986{Halley's Comet}will be sighted again.The comet was seen last in 1910 and the next time it will be observed (apart from 1986) will be 2062.When it appears in 1986 a satelite interceptor called{Giotto} willenable us to learn about the comets composition and to detect it's nucleus--if it exists,it may also reveal some of the mysteries surrounding the origins of our solar system.The satelite is named after the florentine artist Giotto Di Bondone who (it is estimated) was born in 1267 and died 1337.Giotto painted a fresco called "The Adoration of the Magi",painted in the background of this picture was Halley's Comet.The Giotto satelite will be one in five satelites sent to meet Halley's Comet.In 1986 High Top observatory will observe Halley's Comet.
